overview: 4 Short films of 4 stories of the main characters named 'i' who are on their different path of L G B T. They are unique in their own way, in love and feel differently. No matter what is waiting for them at the end of their paths, at least, they have decided to be 'i' in the way that they are.
tagline: i STORIES tells the separate tales of a transgender woman, a bisexual woman, a gay man, and a lesbian, who all share the name "i."
title: i STORIES
